    • Field Detail

      • ROBOCOL_VERSION

        public static final byte ROBOCOL_VERSION
        ROBOCOL_VERSION controls the compatibility of the network protocol between driver station and network controller. If that protocol changes in a non-backward-compatible way, increment this constant to ensure incompatible apps do not attempt to communicate with each other.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • determineBindAddress

        public static java.net.InetAddress determineBindAddress(java.net.InetAddress destAddress)
        Find a bind address. If no bind address can be found, return the loopback address
        Parameters:
        destAddress - destination address
        Returns:
        address to bind to

      • determineBindAddressBasedOnWifiP2pSubnet

        public static java.net.InetAddress determineBindAddressBasedOnWifiP2pSubnet(java.util.ArrayList<java.net.InetAddress> localIpAddresses,
                                                                            java.net.InetAddress destAddress)
        Find a bind address that is in the Wifi P2P subnet. If no bind address can be found, return the loopback address.
        Parameters:
        destAddress - destination address
        Returns:
        address to bind to

      • determineBindAddressBasedOnIsReachable

        public static java.net.InetAddress determineBindAddressBasedOnIsReachable(java.util.ArrayList<java.net.InetAddress> localIpAddresses,
                                                                          java.net.InetAddress destAddress)
        Find a bind address that can reach the destAddress. If no bind address can be found, return the loopback address. The InetAddress.isReachable() method is used to determine if the address is reachable.
        Parameters:
        destAddress - destination address
        Returns:
        address to bind to
